com.pom.crimson.api

Class ContentAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pom.crimson.api.ContentAPI

  • public class ContentAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    ContentAPI class contains functions to make GET,PUT,POST,etc calls to Content Service API and receive response from same. This uses Rest Assured library to create requests and fetch responses
    Author:
    Jaspreet Kaur Chagger

    • Method Detail

      • getRecommendedContentHomePage

        public io.restassured.response.Response getRecommendedContentHomePage(java.lang.String profileID)
        Fetches recommended content for the homepage. Uses Content Controller API.
        Parameters:
        profileID - profileId of logged in user
        Returns:
        Response with Recommended content containing tagged archetypes,title,description, development months, interests etc

      • getListOfBookmarksForProfile

        public io.restassured.response.Response getListOfBookmarksForProfile(java.lang.String profileID)
        Gets a list of bookmarks for a profile. Uses Content Action Controller API.
        Parameters:
        profileID - profileId of logged in user
        Returns:
        Response with bookmarked content

      • getListOfLikesForProfile

        public io.restassured.response.Response getListOfLikesForProfile(java.lang.String profileID)
        Gets a list of likes for a profile. Uses Content Action Controller API.
        Parameters:
        profileID - profileId of logged in user
        Returns:
        Response with Liked content

      • getDailyTips

        public io.restassured.response.Response getDailyTips(java.lang.String profileID)
        Gets a daily tip for the given profile, if one exists. Daily tip is shown on Home Page. Uses Content Controller.
        Parameters:
        profileID - profileId of logged in user
        Returns:
        Response with daily tips

      • getContentBasedOnUserGroups

        public io.restassured.response.Response getContentBasedOnUserGroups(java.lang.String profileID)
        Fetches recommended content based on a user's joined groups. This content is shown on Based on your groups page. Uses Content Controller
        Parameters:
        profileID - profileId of logged in user
        Returns:
        Response with Recommended content containing tagged archetypes,title,description, development months, interests etc

      • getSpecificContentBasedOnStrapiID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getSpecificContentBasedOnStrapiID(java.lang.String strapiID)
        Gets a list of content based on given Strapi IDs. Uses Content Controller.
        Parameters:
        strapiID - StrapiID of content piece(Article,Video etc)
        Returns:
        Response Complete content response containing tagged archetypes,title,description, development months, interests etc

      • PutLikeContent

        public io.restassured.response.Response PutLikeContent(java.lang.String profileId,
                                                       java.lang.String contentId)
        Un-like a piece of content. Uses Content Action Controller.
        Parameters:
        profileId - profileId of logged in user
        contentId - contentId of content piece(Article,Video etc)
        Returns:
        Response

      • PutBookmarkContent

        public io.restassured.response.Response PutBookmarkContent(java.lang.String profileId,
                                                           java.lang.String contentId)
        Un-bookmark a piece of content. Uses Content Action Controller.
        Parameters:
        profileId - profileId of logged in user
        contentId - contentId of content piece(Article,Video etc)
        Returns:
        Response

      • GetContentInterestName

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetContentInterestName(java.lang.String profileId,
                                                               java.lang.String interestName)
        Fetches recommended content based on a specific interest. Uses Content Controller.
        Parameters:
        profileId - profileId of logged in user
        interestName - Name of Interest (Example: Fertility, Baby care etc)
        Returns:
        Response with Recommended content containing tagged archetypes,title,description, development months, interests etc
